BLOCK.QRY: UPDATE PISCAD_ADV_PO_GEN_TRN SET NUM_UPDATION_FLAG=1 WHERE NUM_UPDATION_FLAG=0 AND STR_ADV_NUMBER=? AND GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
UPDATE PISCAD_ADV_FILE_TRN SET STR_CASE_STATUS=3 WHERE STR_ADV_NUMBER=? AND GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?

UPDATE PISCAD_ADV_BILL_GEN_TRN SET NUM_REQ_REC_DEPTCODE=?,STR_TYPE_OF_BILL=?,STR_BILL_NUMBER=?,DT_BILL_DATE=?,NUM_TOT_AMT_TOBE_PAID=?,GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?,GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=?,STR_CHEQUE_NO=?, STR_BANK_DETAILS=?, DT_CHEQUE_DATE=?, DT_DATE_OF=?,STR_PAYMENT_FLAG=?,STR_BILL_ACCEPT_FLAG=? WHERE STR_PO_ORDER_NO=? AND GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=? and STR_BILL_NUMBER=?
UPDATE PISCAD_ADV_BILL_GEN_TRN T SET T.GNUM_ISVALID=0 WHERE STR_PO_ORDER_NO=? AND T.GNUM_ISVALID=1 AND GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
